content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that crafts iron gear wheels
- Assembling machine (position z2) that crafts iron sticks
- Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace to the assembling machines

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, the recipe for Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
